channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Very poor road needs resurfacing at Bayshiil Road, Cheltenham., 13th July
item.description:
Location: Bayshiil Road Cheltenham. Poor road surface each direction of the zebra crossing by the Ladies Collage. Could you put on plans to resurface this area of the road please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bayshill Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several potholes on wellington square, 12th July
item.description:
Several potholes in the road between Evesham road and wellington square. I can see that this road is used regularly by traffic going to and from dunalley school so it is important that the road does not have any holes in it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree was cut down but roots never removed, previous reference number - 11451401, 12th July
item.description:
33 Linden Avenue - corner plot. Reference of job - 11451401 The tree was cut down and the root was due to be removed but no one ever returned. An arboricultual assessment report took place to prove the damage was caused by roots from the tree. The tree was removed around September last year after being originally reported in February 2024, the roots continue to damage my property and are getting ever closer to the house. My 2 year son has also been injured as a result of the slabs being damaged. We have made numerous calls for someone to return and finish the job and solve the problem but nothing has happened. This is now impacting our ability to have a family life in the garden and causes anxiety to our family as the roots become dangerously close to the house.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Linden Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A40 junction with motorway m5 11, 12th July
item.description:
The local authorities are responsible for liter on this roundabout A40 and you have done nothing to remove it, even in safe areas. The area is disgusting with tons of litter not removed for years. Other local authorities clean there areas! Please stop breaking the law and arrange for it to be cleaned asp and monitor in future
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Golden Valley Junction, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Flyposting by Estate Agent on lamppost, 11th July
item.description:
An estate agent has put a For Sale sign high up on a lamppost (public road furniture) with a scan code sign beneath it. I reported it to Cheltenham Borough Council 6 weeks ago and they did not even pass it on to you until I chased and they admitted it fell under your remit.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
